March 7, 1982 D Oldham Contest (Championship and Section 2)
Oldham Contest (Championship and Section 2) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
oldham-contest-championship-and-section-2
None
Queen Elizabeth Hall, Oldham, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £130 and cup, 2nd £100, 3rd £80. 12 bands competed. 11th annual contest.
June 19, 2014, 9:16 p.m. Jan. 27, 2015, 1:45 p.m.
